sys_update_xml.payload: c$pe-theme-color: #283347 !default; $pe-theme-background-color: #1c2432 !default; $pe-text-color: #fff !default; $pe-sub-text-color: #68acd8 !default; $pe-status-color-normal: #29bd00 !default; .people-card-flyout { .badge { border-radius: 100px; float: right; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; height: 28px; margin-top: -5px; padding-top: 7px; } .photo { img { height: 40px; width: 40px; } &:after { background-color: $pe-status-color-normal; border-radius: 50%; content: ''; height: 10px; left: 80%; position: absolute; top: 78%; width: 10px; } } color: $pe-text-color; .panel { border: 0; color: $pe-text-color; background-color: transparent; .panel-heading { border-bottom: 0 !important; background-color: $pe-theme-color !important; color: $pe-text-color !important; font-size: 12px; padding: 14px; text-transform: uppercase; } .panel-body { background-color: $pe-theme-background-color; color: $pe-text-color; h4 { font-size: 24px; margin-top: -5px !important; } .user-sub-text { color: $pe-sub-text-color; font-size: 12px; margin-bottom: -5px; margin-top: -5px; } .sub-text { color: $pe-sub-text-color; font-size: 10px; margin: -5px 0 -5px 0; text-transform: uppercase; } } .panel-vips { .panel-heading { background-color: #394b6b !important; border-radius: 0; padding-bottom: 15px; } .star-ribbon { margin-right: 16px; } .lower-case { margin-left: -2px; } .badge { background-color: $pe-theme-color; width: 76px; } .user-sub-text { margin-top: -10px; } .row { margin-bottom: 30px; &:first-child { margin-top: 5px; } &:last-child { margin-bottom: 5px; } } } } .panel-vips.ng-hide-add, .panel-vips.ng-hide-remove { -webkit-transition: .3s ease all; transition: .3s ease all; display: block !important; opacity: 1; } .panel-vips.ng-hide { opacity: 0; } .header-left-icon { margin: 0 0 7px 11%; span { float: right; margin-right: 40%; } } .add-circle, .close-circle { height: 23px; margin-top: -3px; .add-circle, .close-circle { height: 23px; margin-top: -3px; width: 23px; } width: 23px; } .star-ribbon { height: 24px; width: 18px; } }sp_instancetruepe-people-card-flyoutfalsePE People Card Flyout[{ "name": "title", "default_value": "People at Risk", "label": "Title", "type": "string" }, { "name": "number_1", "default_value": "1631", "label": "Number 1", "type": "integer" }, { "name": "number_2", "default_value": "4", "label": "Number 2", "type": "integer" }, { "name": "number_3", "default_value": "21", "label": "Number 3", "type": "integer" }, { "name": "sub_text_1", "default_value": "Email Inboxes", "label": "Sub Text 1", "type": "string" }, { "name": "sub_text_2", "default_value": "VIP Users", "label": "Sub Text 2", "type": "string" }, { "name": "sub_text_3", "default_value": "Open Rate", "label": "Sub Text 3", "type": "string" }]truefalsesp_widgetadmin2017-03-14 21:01:10true5f8feff0dbe5b20062e479daae9619fc107PE People Card Flyoutglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_5f8feff0dbe5b20062e479daae9619fcsteven.gregory2017-08-02 15:29:28
